title: ArtyTorrent Pack 34-Drum n Bass Loops-160-169bpm-WAV samples
description:
ArtyTorrent Pack 34-Drum n Bass Loops-160-169bpm-WAV samples
------------------------------------------------------------

This pack was inspired by requests for some 2-step drum loops.
Included are loops for the Drum n&#039; Bass genre with the majority using digital drumkits, and with some digital signal processing effects. (A more organic Jungle-style pack will follow). The tempo is obviously up in the 160bpm range.

Torrent contains 6 RAR files.
-----------------------------
CF DnB 160-168 (10 loops) 
Desimal Breaks 160-168 (16 loops)
DnB Kit Loops 160 (66 loops)
DnB Kit Loops 168 (19 loops)
Ground Loops 160-168 (23 loops)
LM Drum n Bass Producer 165 (7 loops)

All samples are normalized 16-bit Acidized WAVs at 44.1KHz, looped precisely and containing the approx bpm in the filenames, ready to be dropped into your own productions, or chopped up and effected as you wish.

The samples are from a variety of sources including Sony Acid Chicago Fire and Ground Loops, and Loopmasters DnB Producer.

--
Arty - "It can&#039;t be intelligent drum n&#039; bass if he can&#039;t spell decimal".
3rd Feb 2008 (Super Sunday).
